title: LIVE Niche Research For Amazon KDP
description:
Niche Research for Amazon KDP can be very challenging for any level of book publisher, but even more so when you are first starting out!
In this video, I let you become my co-pilot as we jump onto Amazon and you get to see what things I look for when completing Niche Research to hopefully find that $5,000 p/year book!

Free Niche Research Tracker via my GumRoad Store: https://gumroad.com/lifegraduate
